sep=: Title
column4: Preconditions
column6: Steps
column7: Expected Results

sep=: Register account with valid email and password
column4: User is on the registration page
column6: 1. Click on "Create new user" link, 2. Enter valid email address, 3. Enter secure password without forbidden characters, 4. Click on "Sign up" button
column7: User is registered and logged in

sep=: Register account with invalid email
column4: User is on the registration page
column6: 1. Click on "Create new user" link, 2. Enter invalid email address, 3. Enter secure password without forbidden characters, 4. Click on "Sign up" button
column7: Error message is displayed and user is not registered

sep=: Register account with invalid password
column4: User is on the registration page
column6: 1. Click on "Create new user" link, 2. Enter valid email address, 3. Enter insecure password with forbidden characters, 4. Click on "Sign up" button
column7: Error message is displayed and user is not registered

sep=: Login with valid email and password
column4: User is on the login page
column6: 1. Click on "Login" button, 2. Enter valid email address, 3. Enter correct password, 4. Click on "Log in" button
column7: User is logged in

sep=: Login with invalid email
column4: User is on the login page
column6: 1. Click on "Login" button, 2. Enter invalid email address, 3. Enter correct password, 4. Click on "Log in" button
column7: Error message is displayed and user is not logged in

sep=: Login with invalid password
column4: User is on the login page
column6: 1. Click on "Login" button, 2. Enter valid email address, 3. Enter incorrect password, 4. Click on "Log in" button
column7: Error message is displayed and user is not logged in

sep=: Login with empty email and password fields
column4: User is on the login page
column6: 1. Click on "Login" button, 2. Leave email address field empty, 3. Leave password field empty, 4. Click on "Log in" button
column7: Error message is displayed and user is not logged in

sep=: Log out
column4: User is logged in
column6: 1. Click on "Log out" button
column7: User is logged out and redirected to the login page

sep=: Reset password with valid email
column4: User is on the password reset page
column6: 1. Click on "Forgot my password" button, 2. Enter valid email address, 3. Click on "Send email" button, 4. Check email inbox, 5. Click on the password reset link, 6. Enter new secure password, 7. Confirm new password, 8. Click on "Reset password" button
column7: User is able to log in with the new password

sep=: Reset password with invalid email
column4: User is on the password reset page
column6: 1. Click on "Forgot my password" button, 2. Enter invalid email address, 3. Click on "Send email" button
column7: Error message is displayed and password reset link is not sent

sep=: Verify email validation for invalid email characters
column4: User is on the registration page
column6: 1. Click on "Create new user" link, 2. Enter email address with invalid characters, 3. Click on "Sign up" button
column7: Error message is displayed and user is not registered

column4: User is on the registration page

column7: Error message is displayed and user is not registered

sep=: Verify password reset link expiration
column4: User has requested password reset
column6: 1. Wait for more than 1 hour, 2. Click on the password reset link
column7: Error message is displayed and password cannot be reset

column7: Error message is displayed and password cannot be reset

column4: User account is locked

column7: Error message is displayed and user is not logged in

sep=: Verify login with already logged in user
column4: User is already logged in

column7: User is not able to log in again
